item.description:
Hello Madams!!
Let's meetup for a fabulous night of dinning and conversation at Poodam's Thai Restaurant in Astoria! After a delicious meal we can head over to one of Astoria's great lounges to have drinks and more... If you are up to playing board games or just lounging and having a good time with the girls, here are three great venues that we can pick from at dinner:

Cafe Bar (a lounge with great drinks, DJ, and provides board games. Is a really relaxed but hip atmosphere as well).

Studio Square (Astoria's new Beer Garden has a very vibrant atmosphere, indoor and outdoor seating, and occassionally has a band performing)

Break Bar & Billiards (provides an uncrowded atmosphere with pool and ping pong

So please RSVP for the next outing. We're so looking forward to meeting you all!
Lisa

Note: If this meetup becomes full, we will try to make arrangements to accommodate you. Please notify the organizer Lisa via email so she can assist you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign on the table in the restaurant.
item.name: Dinner & More!!
